name: Star Bound
description:
Hello and welcome to Star Bound!

Star Bound is an in-the-works text-based adventure game wherein you play the role of the commander of a space vessel headed out to establish an interplanetary colony when you are intercepted by an alien battle cruiser.

***Star Bound is not ready to be played on a mobile device. Please play the prototype on CPU or another compatible device. Thank you for your patience!***
